title: Extension Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of extension manifest files in .project/extensions/. Extensions describe structural additions to the .project directory, providing directories, instructions, agents, and hooks.

provides.description: What this extension contributes to the .project directory.

directories.description: Custom directories added to .project/ by this extension.

instructions.description: Instruction files or names provided by this extension.

agents.description: Agent definitions provided by this extension.

hooks.description: Lifecycle hooks provided by this extension.

mcp_servers.description: MCP server configurations provided by this extension.

extensions.description: Other extensions that must be installed.

tools.description: Tools that must be available for this extension to function.
